column4: would probably be better to ask in here... got a question about partitioning, anyone available?
ah; fo ra notebook? or installs it from the net? hehe
how many other partition uve got?
well u can have up to 4 primary partitions; its up to u
for example, my system: 4 partitions: 1 factory utilities, 1 Diagnostics, 1 Windows, 1 Extended (another win partition, & 4 linux partitions)
what partitions do u plan on?
I suggest: Extended partition under which there is at least / & /home (that's better if ur / failed or ur doing a fresh isntall; u dont format the /home & u keep ur data 7 preferences)
btw, am not sure what's the difference between the netboot & the alternative disk, but the alternative disk gives u more options & a non-graphical installer
jpds says: The netbook also features the non-graphical installer.
